file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-60-04-02 - MEGAPHONE - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MEGAPHONE - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to discard the megaphone batteries. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 25-60-04-960-801-A ♦ MEGAPHONE BATTERY - DISCARD EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-60-04 Page 1 of 4 Rev 52 - Apr 28/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-60-04-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MEGAPHONE BATTERY - DISCARD A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to discard the megaphone batteries. (2) The megaphone is attached by a clamp in a specified support and is installed inside of the outboard galley or the RH wardrobe. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin H. Discard of Megaphone Batteries (Figure 201) SUBTASK 960-002-A (1) On the outboard galley or the RH wardrobe, open the access door. (2) Discard the batteries (5) of the megaphone (3) as follows: (a) Open the clamp (4) and remove the megaphone (3) from its support. (b) Remove the screws (1) that attach the microphone and mouthpiece assembly (6) to housing (2). (c) Pull the microphone and mouthpiece assembly (6) to remove it from the housing (2). (d) Tilt the megaphone (3) and remove the batteries (5) from the housing (2). Discard the batteries(5) in the correct location. (e) Put new batteries (5) in the housing (2). NOTE: Make sure that the poles of the new batteries are in the correct position before you put each battery in its compartment. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 25-60-04 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (f) Put the microphone and mouthpiece assembly (6) in their installation position and install the screws (1). (g) Put the megaphone (3) back on the support and close the clamp (4). (3) On the outboard galley or the RH wardrobe, close the access door. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 25-60-04 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
